name: hledger-vscode
description: hledger language server client for VS Code

hledgerLanguageServer.maxNumberOfProblem.description: Maximum number of problems (diagnostics) reported per file.

hledgerLanguageServer.hledgerPath.description: Path to the hledger executable used for validations that rely on hledger.

hledgerLanguageServer.validation.balance.description: Validate that transactions are balanced per commodity.

hledgerLanguageServer.validation.missing.description: Check that at most one posting in each transaction may omit an amount.

hledgerLanguageServer.validation.undecla.description: Report usages of accounts that have not been declared.
Report usages of payees that have not been declared.
Report usages of commodities that have not been declared.
Report usages of tags that have not been declared.

hledgerLanguageServer.validation.dateOrd.description: Warn when transaction dates are out of order.

hledgerLanguageServer.validation.emptyTr.description: Report transactions that have no postings.

hledgerLanguageServer.validation.invalid.description: Report invalid dates in directives or transactions.

hledgerLanguageServer.validation.include.description: Report missing or unreadable include files.

hledgerLanguageServer.validation.circula.description: Detect and report circular include relationships.

hledgerLanguageServer.severity.undeclare.description: Severity level for undeclared account diagnostics.
Severity level for undeclared payee diagnostics.
Severity level for undeclared commodity diagnostics.
Severity level for undeclared tag diagnostics.

hledgerLanguageServer.include.followIncl.description: Follow include directives when parsing for validation and features.

hledgerLanguageServer.include.maxDepth.description: Maximum depth of include nesting to follow when parsing.

hledgerLanguageServer.completion.onlyDec.description: Only offer completions for accounts that have been declared.
Only offer completions for payees that have been declared.
Only offer completions for commodities that have been declared.
Only offer completions for tags that have been declared.

hledgerLanguageServer.formatting.indenta.description: Number of spaces used to indent postings and directives.

hledgerLanguageServer.formatting.maxAcco.description: Maximum width for account names when aligning columns.

hledgerLanguageServer.formatting.maxComm.description: Maximum width for commodity symbols when aligning columns.

hledgerLanguageServer.formatting.maxAmou.description: Maximum width for amounts when aligning columns.

hledgerLanguageServer.formatting.decimal.description: Target column for aligning posting amounts' decimal separators.

hledgerLanguageServer.formatting.asserti.description: Target column for aligning balance assertion amounts' decimal separators.

hledgerLanguageServer.inlayHints.showInf.description: Show inlay hints for inferred posting amounts.

hledgerLanguageServer.inlayHints.showRun.description: Show inlay hints for running balances on accounts.

hledgerLanguageServer.inlayHints.showCos.description: Show inlay hints for cost conversions between commodities.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
